CustomField.formula:
if(Second_Year_Software_Net_Total__c!=0, '2nd Year Uplift = '+TEXT(Round((Second_Year_Software_Net_Total__c- First_Year_Software_Net_Total__c )/First_Year_Software_Net_Total__c*100,2))+'%', '') &' '&
if(Third_Year_Software_Net_Total__c!=0,', 3rd Year Uplift = '+TEXT(ROUND((Third_Year_Software_Net_Total__c - Second_Year_Software_Net_Total__c )/Second_Year_Software_Net_Total__c*100,2))+'%', '' )
CustomField.label: Yearly Software Uplift %
